doc:
Berthe Bady https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Berthe_Bady 0 Berthe Bady (1872 – 1921) was a French actress of Belgian origin. She was the companion of Lugné-Poe and Henry Bataille. The fortunes she had won as an actress were devoted to her household with Bataille. Berthe died in isolation at Jouy-sur-Eure. Berthe_Bady ( 1872 – 1921 ) was a_French_actress of Belgian_origin . She was the_companion of Lugné-Poe and Henry_Bataille . The_fortunes she had_won as an_actress were_devoted to her_household with Bataille . Berthe died in isolation at Jouy-sur-Eure .
